author: @mr.rover26
text:
Haha Rockstar Nakamoto, I've always adored recording behinds and when I got notification of Yuta recordings I was so exited, really loved this and enjoyed a lot, I smiled so much when I better realised that he was recording his own solo songs, which he wrote and composed. I just really want to see every little detail of creating this album, truly a masterpiece. And Yuta is one of most hard working, creative and freaking cool person I've ever known. Just crazy how he participated in every detail of creating his solo, whether it's lyrics, arranging, composition, design etc. and it must be so hard to do group and solo recordings at the same time cuz they're totally different genres and need different techniques and it's must be insanely hard to switch voice and techniques. And the fact that recordings was made in Korea, yuta even rented a studio for recordings, it's not SM and then recordings was sent in Japan and adjusted here. It was really crazy hard to do this album and then organise the tour, I'm really glad that he finally debuted with his anticipated solo and l loved this album with my whole heart cuz it's crazy, insanely good!
